object.creator: 开发者
object.name: VO_XMXXTZ_GS_STGLDGYS
object.package: 底稿日期台账.项目信息台账
object.describe: 项目信息台账(受托管理底稿验收台账)

column.name: RQ
column.describe: 本年受托事务报告披露日期

column.name: GDJZRQ
column.describe: 受托底稿验收截止日期

column.name: GDSJRQ
column.describe: 受托管理纸质底稿实际验收日期

constraint.SQL:
["tIB_XMXX_GS_ZQXX.XMMC_FXQ is not null 
and tIB_XMXX_GS_ZQXX.ID not in (SELECT ZQXX FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXXTZ WHERE ZQXX IS NOT NULL)
AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX_GS T2,ECIF.lcIB_GS_LXLC T4,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY T5 WHERE T2.ID = tIB_XMXX_GS_ZQXX.XMMC_FXQ AND T4.INSTID = T5.ID AND T5.STATE = 4 AND T4.XMMC = T2.ID)
 OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX_GS T2,ECIF.lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC T4,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY T5 WHERE T4.INSTID = T5.ID AND T5.STATE = 4 AND T4.XMMC = T2.ID))",[]]

column.name: GDSJRQ
column.describe: 项目发行纸质底稿实际验收日期

column.name: RQ
column.describe: 本年受托事务报告披露日期

column.name: RQ
column.describe: 本年受托事务报告披露日期

column.name: GDSJRQ
column.describe: 项目发行纸质底稿实际验收日期
